attributes.action: Arrange the repatriation of all convicted terrorist families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It would appear then many of the people that wish to wage a war of terrorism against this country have large parts of their family also living in this country with them.
To discourage plots and attacks against this country and also our troops overseas, we belive that all convicted terrorists should know that when they commit a crime it will also affect his or her family as well.
We petition the prime minister to motion for a law that will repatriate all convicted terrorists family members back to their country of origin. If they are born and bred in the UK then they will have all benifit removed if recieving any.
This should stop the rise in home grown terrorist .
